imdb.plot outline: The Horse is a whimsical, lighthearted canter chronicling 6,000 years of humankind's relationship with one of its longest and most durable companions: the horse. From wild, free grasslands of ancient times to the winner's circle of modern horse racing, horses and humans have coexisted in equine-like equanimity since domestication began in the Ukraine in 4,000 BC. From transportation mode, to mythologized hero, to humble pet, the horse has galloped a path through human history. The Horse. A documentary series that takes you on a fascinating journey along that path.
imdb.title: The Horse
